original_text: Now as I looked at the living creatures, I saw a wheel on the earth beside the living creatures, one for each of the four of them.
korean_text: 내가 그 생물들을 보니 그 생물들 곁에 있는 땅 위에는 바퀴가 있는데 그 네 얼굴을 따라 하나씩 있고

sentences.original_text: Now as I looked at the living creatures
I saw a wheel on the earth beside the living creatures
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 땅 위에 생물들 곁에 바퀴를 보았다

sentences.original_text: one for each of the four of them
